name: A debtor Service Provider successfully takes over an activation from another provider
fullName: A Debtor Service Provider performs takeover of an existing activation: A debtor Service Provider successfully takes over an activation from another provider

steps.name: Given the debtor Service Provider is authenticated
And the debtor Service Provider B is authenticated
And the debtor A has fiscal code random
And the debtor Service Provider activated the debtor A
When the debtor Service Provider B attempts to activate the debtor A
Then the activation fails because debtor A is already activated
When the debtor Service Provider B performs takeover for debtor A
Then the debtor A is now managed by Service Provider B

labels.name: feature
labels.value: A Debtor Service Provider performs takeover of an existing activation
